properties.name: Port of Gdańsk
properties.details: Largest Baltic Sea port, main container hub, handles 2.05M TEU containers, 3,500+ ships annually

properties.name: Port of Gdynia
properties.details: Strategic Baltic Sea port, handles containers, bulk cargo, and roll-on/roll-off vessels

properties.name: Port of Szczecin
properties.details: Part of Szczecin-Świnoujście port complex, handles iron ore, fertilizers, agricultural products, fuel

properties.name: Port of Świnoujście
properties.details: Deep-water port, part of Szczecin-Świnoujście complex, strategic energy gateway

properties.name: Gdynia Naval Base
properties.details: Primary naval base with advanced docking facilities, repair workshops, storage warehouses, communication centers

properties.name: Naval Academy Gdynia
properties.details: Premier institution for training future Polish naval officers and maintaining operational readiness

properties.name: Świnoujście LNG Terminal
properties.details: Critical LNG terminal reducing dependency on Russian gas, part of Poland's energy security strategy

properties.name: Gdańsk LNG Terminal
properties.details: New LNG terminal under development to further diversify Poland's gas supply

properties.name: Baltic Power Offshore Wind Farm
properties.details: Poland's first offshore wind farm, 28km offshore near Choczewo/Łeba, water depth -40m, commissioning 2026, covers 3% national electricity demand

properties.name: Łeba O&M Base
properties.details: Poland's first offshore wind operations & maintenance base supporting Baltic Power for its 30-year lifecycle

properties.name: Wolin East Oil Field
properties.details: Largest conventional oil field in Poland, 6km from Świnoujście, discovered recently

properties.name: B3 Oil Field
properties.details: Poland's first offshore oil field, 80km north of Rozewie, Baltic Beta jack-up rig, oil depth 1,450m below seabed, sea depth 80m, operated by ORLEN Petrobaltic

properties.name: B8 Oil Field
properties.details: 70km north of Jastarnia, LOTOS Petrobaltic platform, producing since 2006

properties.name: Baltic Pipe - Niechorze Landing Point
properties.details: Coastal landing point at Niechorze-Pogorzelica where Baltic Pipe comes ashore from Denmark

properties.name: Baltic Pipe - Goleniów Compressor Station
properties.details: Inland compressor station for 275km Baltic Sea section from Denmark, operational since Sept 2022

properties.name: Baltic Pipe - Odolanów Compressor
properties.details: Key compressor station for Baltic Pipe gas transmission system

properties.name: Gdańsk Cable Landing Station
properties.details: Critical telecommunications infrastructure connecting Poland to Baltic Sea fiber optic cable network

properties.name: Świnoujście Cable Landing
properties.details: Landing point for Poland-Sweden power cable and fiber optic segments

properties.name: Świnoujście Container Terminal
properties.details: Major deep-water container terminal project to increase Szczecin-Świnoujście port complex capacity
